data.message: Give me the choice of having messenger!! No! I don't want messenger!!!!!

replies.message: Hi Mariana. We're hard at work on continued improvements to the Messenger app. If there's something that we could do to improve your experience, please let us know: http://on.fb.me/1r3iIBf  - Elissa
Here's an idea, @facebook, don't make improvements to messenger, abandon it and leave that functionality embedded in the Facebook app!!!

Little side note. Fb app requests the same as the fb medsanger. If you use the fb app you have given it all those permissions you fear already. Instead dropped both apps and use fb website on your phones browser, yes the regular messanger works on it
Don't want a serparate messenger app. PERIOD!! Regardless of "permissions"!!

Kinda screwed up how you guys can access all our texts, phone calls, internet searches and open our cameras and see out surroundings without out knowledge. Can't even deny it because it was on the news 👌
